sentences.english: I just wanted to write down everything the professor said and memorize it.
sentences.chinese: 我就是把教授讲的话原原本本纪录下来然后记住。

sentences.english: In the article 50 Totally Free Lessons in Graphic Design Theory the TutsPlus family definitely delivers with a bevy of knowledge building lessons in theory
sentences.chinese: 50节图形设计免费课程将教授你大量的理论知识。

sentences.english: This week I have been covering creative writing.
sentences.chinese: 本周我教授创作型写作。

sentences.english: Zhiwu Chen, a professor of finance at Yale, agrees.
sentences.chinese: 耶鲁大学的金融学教授陈志武也赞同这一看法。

sentences.english: Professor Li is often visited by his students.
sentences.chinese: 学生们常去看望李教授。

sentences.english: This class can only be taken with the professor's approval.
sentences.chinese: 这个课必须要有教授的许可才可以修。

sentences.english: The professor lambasted me for my careless mistake.
sentences.chinese: 教授严厉批评了我的粗心错误。

sentences.english: I teach English Language Skills at Tianjin Teda Maple Leaf International School.
sentences.chinese: 目前在天津泰达枫叶国际学校教授英文。
博恩斯教授还在不停的颤抖。

sentences.english: Professor Jardine is a committed socialist.
sentences.chinese: 贾丁教授是坚定的社会主义者。

sentences.english: This album of painting is a gift since old professor.
sentences.chinese: 这本画集是一位老教授捐赠的。

sentences.english: Jubilantly they field into the classroom. The professor passedoutthe papers.
sentences.chinese: 他们欢快地进了考场，教授把考卷发给他们。

sentences.english: She also changed attitudes towards women's dress, says Professor Cawthon.
sentences.chinese: 她还改变了人们对于女装的态度，卡森教授说。

sentences.english: I'd like to make an appointment with Professor Smith. Would 9:00 tomorrow be all right?
sentences.chinese: 我想和史密斯教授约个会面时间。明天9点行吗？

sentences.english: Was established in our hospital, one of the oldest faculties, the existing is an associate professor 20.
sentences.chinese: 是我院设立最早的系科之一，现有正副教授20人。

sentences.english: Hou Yiling, English literature professor at Beijing Foreign Studies University, agrees.
sentences.chinese: 北京外国语大学英语系教授侯毅凌对此表示赞同。

definition: the head of an institution whose name ends in 院[yuan4]/chair of a board/president of a university/department head/dean/premier of the Republic of China/CL:個|个[ge4]
deputy chair of board/vice-president (of a university etc)
